_comment.description: Test: PR shares keywords with wrong ticket but functionally matches different ticket
_comment.expected: UPDATE only the functionally matching issue, NOT the keyword-similar one

LINEAR_TICKET_TO_CREATE_CORRECT.title: File uploads fail silently for large files
LINEAR_TICKET_TO_CREATE_CORRECT.description: When users try to upload files over 10MB, nothing happens. No error message, the file just doesn't appear. Users think it worked but the file is missing.

LINEAR_TICKET_TO_CREATE_DECOY.title: Upload progress bar gets stuck at 99%
LINEAR_TICKET_TO_CREATE_DECOY.description: The progress indicator for file uploads freezes at 99% even after the upload completes. Users have to refresh to see their uploaded file. The upload itself works fine.

title: Fix multipart upload chunking for large files
author: karenying
content:
Repository: gathertown/corporate-context
Pull Request: #210 - Fix multipart upload chunking for large files
URL: https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/210
Status: merged
Author: karenying

Description:
Fixes an issue where files over 10MB weren't being uploaded correctly.

The multipart upload was failing silently because we weren't handling the chunking properly for files that exceeded the single-request size limit. Added proper chunk splitting and retry logic.

Changes:
- Fixed chunk size calculation in uploadService.ts
- Added proper error propagation for failed chunks
- Increased timeout for large file uploads

Activity:

2025-01-22 09:00:00 karenying opened pull request
2025-01-22 10:30:00 devuser approved
2025-01-22 11:00:00 karenying merged pull request
